error.title: Error
error.description: If the login request failed, this field will contain the error message

error_code.title: Error Code
error_code.description: If the login request failed, this field will contain the error code

token.title: Token
token.description: The auth token that lets your users login into permit elements

extra.title: Extra
extra.description: Extra data that you can pass to the login request

redirect_url.title: Redirect Url
redirect_url.description: The full URL to which the user should be redirected in order to complete the login process
